titleInfo.title: 1836 Mar. 16, Columbus [Ohio], [to] Doct[or] A. King [amp] Co [mpany]

subject.topic: Ferris, D.; Dr. A King [amp] Company; J. Pike [amp] Company.

mods.note: This document is a letter written from J. Pike [amp] Company to Doctor A. King [amp] Company dated March 16, 1836. The letter shows a listing of medicines ordered by Doctor A. King [amp] Company from J. Pike [amp] Company. The medicines are arriving late because of delays due to a canal being closed. Some of the medicines listed are herbs and seasonings used to create medicines. The letter is concluded by giving a recipe for wine bitter using some of the medicines named in the letter.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
